description: Lists the default vocabularies for the specified Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The language code of the vocabulary entries. For a list of languages and their corresponding language codes, see What is Amazon Transcribe?

nested_items.name: VocabularyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: VocabularyName
nested_items.description: A unique name of the custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.
